answers.answer: You answered your own question. It's Diabetes. You could also have a gastric condition of some kind. You should get all your ailments that are troubling checked out by your GP.

question: I'm an alcoholic, I've drank heavy for the past 10 years or so (34 now), but I've had a full blood (including liver) work up about 2 years ago, all came back clean/healthy.  Over the past 6 months or so I've noticed a sharp contrast to the smell of my poop.  It's smelly, no doubt, but the change is in the smell.Its sweet smelling.  I know that sounds weird, but it smells sweet.  My stools smell like overpowering sweetness.Sickly sweet.It only happens when I drink, (3-4 times a week, 12- 15 drinks per event) or the next day.  I know it's drinking related, but I guess my question is:  "How bad am I?"  I know sweet smelling urine is a sign of diabetes, so I had my doctor run a full blood work up about 2 years ago (not because of the poop smell now, but an unrelated matter at the time (trouble peeing, especially at night)).  I'm scared to ask for it again.I realize my life choices are leading me into an early grave, but I guess my question is this:"How ****** am I, and how bad is it?"
title: Overly sweet smelling poop
